projects.title: GIS Posters/ Brochures
projects.description: I had the oppertunity to create works for CUNY Borough of Manhattan Community College to promote there 'GIS' course department. Which consisted of posters and brochures.

projects.title: Asian Heritage Month Banner
projects.description: I created a banner for CUNY Borough of Manhattan Community College to celebrate Asian Heritage Month 2014.

projects.title: Ruben Musuem
projects.description: I had the oppertunity to create a brochure for the 'Rubin Museum of Art', as an intern in the Borough of Manhattan Community College. These are samples of the pages of I created for the brochure.

projects.title: Cuny Posters
projects.description: I created posters for CUNY Borough of Community College.

projects.title: CityMD
projects.description: I created a billboard advertisment for CityMD, for a college project, which was shown in a gallery in the New York City College of Technology.

projects.title: Trader Joes
projects.description: I created  advertisements for Trader Joes as a college project, which was shown in a gallery in New York City Colllege of Technology.

projects.title: Reboot beer ad
projects.description: I was assigned a project in rebooting a alcoholic beverage label for a companies product, and this is what I came up.

projects.title: Cross Fit
projects.description: I created advertisements for a gym company called 'Cross Fit NYC' for my collage class project at the New York City Colllege of Technology.

projects.title: 3D room
projects.description: I created a three dimensional room using the program Maya for a college project.

projects.title: Character development in 3D
projects.description: I created a three dimensional character which I designed for my animations using the Maya program. He's stars in a couple of short animation videos I created.

projects.title: Storyboard
projects.description: These are some samples of storyboards I created for my animation videos and commercial ads. Which I,ve done for my college projects, which shows the 'Romantic Comedy', and 'Trader Joes commercial'.

projects.title: 2d game level design concept
projects.description: This was a college project to propose a game level I designed , Which was shown in a gallery at the New York City College of Technology.

projects.title: Level Design development
projects.description: This a screenshot of a level I designed and created. I was the lead level designer in a college group project for a game that my group developed, which we used the Unreal 4 Engine.
